bibl.title: Salfest A. Sylvester v. Stener S. Wenaas. Order to Show Cause
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Circuit Court of the United States for the District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.ab: In the Circuit Court of the United States for the Distict of Washington Northern Division
In the Matter of the application of Salfest A. Sylvester for a writ of Habeas Corpus
{ #778 Order to Show Cause x
div1.p: In reading and filing the petition of Salfest A. Sylbester for a writ of habeas corpus corpus' herein, and it appearing herefore that said petitioner is restrained of his liberty against his consent by Stener S. Wenaas and A. J. Van De Vander Sheriff of King County, Washington is herefore hereby ordered that the said Stener S. Wenaas and A. J. Van de Vander show cause to this court for the writ at its court room in the city of Seattle King County, Washington why said writ of habeas corpus so applied for should not be granted and issued. And pending and after further order of this Court, the hearing on and order to show cause the said Stener S. Wenaas and A. J. Van de Vander and each of them are hereby restrained from removing the said petitioner from his present place of custody, except that they are hereby re- strained and ordered to show his body before this court at the hearing on said order to show cause
div1.ab: Done in open Court this 26th day of June 1899
C. H. Hanford Judge of said Court
Marshals Return
div1.p: I hereby certify that I received this writ at Eleven O clock a.m. on June 26 1899 and on or before One Thirty O clock P.M. of the same day I served this writ By copy on A. J. Van de Vanter Sheriff of King County and Stener S. Wenaas at Seattle King County State of Washington This 26th day of June 1899
div1.ab: Dated June 26-1899
Marshal for service 2.00 48 $2.48
C. W. Ide U. S. Marshal
By John STringer Deputy U. S. Marshal
Tx
In the Circuit Court of U. S. for Dist of Washington N. D.
In re application of S A Sylvester for a writ of habeas corpus
order to show cause
FILED IN THE U. S. CIRCUIT COURT, DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
A. REEVES AYRES, Clerk H M Matthew Dep.
R B Albertson Atty for Petitioner
